Package com.ndi

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Validatable
    An interface for all objects capable of validating a JSON Instance against a JSON Schema.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EnumFormatValidator
    A very flexible FormatValidator that enables customizable format keywords.
    EnumFormatValidator.Builder
    This is a static inner class that can used to construct an instance of EnumFormatValidator.
    Rules
    The Rules class represents the set of validation rules that we want our validators to include.
    Table
    Implementation of a table-like object using Hash Table, thus providing efficient look-ups of entries.
    TableFormat
    TableFormat class is used to represent how each column in a given tabular data is separated, and for an entry that consists of multiple values, how those value are separated.
    TableFormat.Format
    A static inner class that consists of two fields.
    Validatable.Util
    An inner class that contains methods all the subclasses that implement this interface might use.
    Validator
    A wrapper class around com.ndi.Everit's json-schema validator implementation: 'https://github.com/everit-org/json-schema', which follows the Draft v7 specification
